item.title: 谢因鲍姆呼吁保持冷静，美国投票后墨西哥股市跌势减弱
item.description: 在美国最大的贸易伙伴和南部邻国唐纳德-特朗普决定性地赢得大选之后，墨西哥人应该保持冷静，美国总统在当地市场开始从最初的震惊中恢复过来时说了一句务实的话。【原文：Mexicans should remain calm in the wake of Donald Trump’s decisive election win, the president of the US’s largest trading partner and southern neighbor said, sounding a note of pragmatism as local markets began to recover from their initial shock.】

item.title: M&A观察家预计特朗普将点燃交易复苏之火
item.description: 据预测，唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫将为更多大手笔并购埋下种子。【原文：Donald Trump’s return to the White House is predicted to seed the ground for more big-ticket mergers and acquisitions.】

item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普的连任有望再次动摇美国农业的格局。【原文：Donald Trump’s reelection promises another shakeup for American agriculture.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税升级计划为何遭到如此多的仇视？
item.description: 美国在其历史上的大部分时期都对进口产品征收重税，但从 20 世纪 30 年代开始，随着政府领导人接受自由贸易的理念，美国基本上放弃了这一政策。高关税在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）2017-2021 年担任总统期间卷土重来，他采用高关税的目的是为了振兴美国制造业，并对抗美国认为是中国的不公平贸易行为。特朗普的继任者乔-拜登保持了这一趋势。【原文：The US heavily taxed imports for much of its history before largely abandoning the policy, beginning in the 1930s, as government leaders embraced the idea of free trade. High tariffs made a comeback during the 2017-2021 presidency of Donald Trump, who adopted them in an effort to revitalize American manufacturing and to counter what the US regards as China’s unfair trade practices. Trump’s successor Joe Biden kept the trend going.】

item.title: 关于刚刚发生的事情和即将发生的事情的九点思考
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜改变美元走势，卢布跌至两年低点
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在美国总统大选中获胜后，加元兑美元汇率跌至两年来的最低点。【原文：The Canadian dollar slumped to its lowest in two years against the US currency after Donald Trump surged to victory in the American presidential election.】

item.title: 迈克尔-诺沃格拉茨（Michael Novogratz）放弃的交易计划显示了特朗普获胜的惊人速度
item.description: 周二晚上，当选举地图开始填上蓝色和红色时，华尔街亿万富翁迈克尔-诺沃格拉茨（Michael Novogratz）躺在床上，手里拿着两部电话和一对笔记本电脑。他身边放着一瓶杰克-丹尼尔（Jack Daniel's）威士忌、一瓶香槟和一品脱柠檬雪酪。【原文：Wall Street billionaire Michael Novogratz sprawled out on his bed with two phones and a pair of laptops as the election maps began to fill in blue and red Tuesday night. At his side was a bottle of Jack Daniel’s, another of Champagne and a pint of lemon sherbet.】

item.title: 海湾街称特朗普胜选将长期提振多伦多证券交易所
item.description: 海湾街（Bay Street）的分析师和投资组合经理认为，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的胜选从长远来看将增强加拿大股市，尽管最初的市场反应使加拿大股市落后于美国股市。【原文：Bay Street analysts and portfolio managers believe Donald Trump’s victory will strengthen Canadian stocks in the long run, even as initial market reaction left Canadian equities trailing US stocks.】

item.title: 华尔街对特朗普的赌注得到回报，ETF 投注得到平反
item.description: 华尔街的交易员们在一系列 ETF 上豪赌数十亿美元，希望在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）重返总统宝座时大获其利。【原文：Wall Street traders who threw caution to the wind by lavishing billions of dollars on a slew of ETF bets that would win big in the event of a Donald Trump presidential comeback are seeing their wagers pay off.】

item.title: 交易商评估特朗普赢得大选的影响，石油价格出现波动
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得大选将加快经济增长的押注与美国市场的利空数据交织在一起，导致石油价格波动。【原文：Oil fluctuated as bets that Donald Trump’s election win will accelerate economic growth vied with bearish market data from the US.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜为 "休眠 "的房地美、房利美交易注入强心剂
item.description: 由于市场猜测唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将使房利美（Fannie Mae）和房地美（Freddie Mac）这两家住房融资机构摆脱危机时期的保全监管，这两家公司发行的长期濒临破产的优先股股价周三大涨。【原文：Shares of long-moribund preferred stock issued by Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac surged on Wednesday amid speculation that Donald Trump will free the housing finance agencies from their crisis-era conservatorship.】

item.title: Capital One 和 Discover 因特朗普获胜放宽合并审批而飙升
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）重返白宫，有望平息人们对 Capital One 金融公司（Capital One Financial Corp.【原文：Donald Trump’s return to the White House is poised to mollify lingering doubts that Capital One Financial Corp. will be allowed to take over Discover Financial Services, one of the biggest mergers announced this year.】

item.title: 特朗普政策为英格兰银行未来降息之路蒙上阴影
item.description: 英国央行本周将再次降息四分之一个百分点，但唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）连任美国总统给英国未来的宽松政策带来了新的不确定性。【原文：The Bank of England is all but assured to cut interest rates by another quarter point this week, but a second US presidential term for Donald Trump has cast new uncertainty over future policy easing in the UK.】

item.title: 特朗普胜选破坏全球降息预期
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普成功重返美国总统宝座后，全世界的央行行长们都在估量，他们对特朗普的最坏担心是否会成为现实。【原文：Central bankers the world over are gauging whether their worst fears over Donald Trump will come to pass following his resounding return to the US presidency.】

item.title: 特鲁多试图让 "焦虑不安 "的加拿大人放心特朗普的回归
item.description: 加拿大总理贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）和他的内阁部长们试图平息人们对美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将对贸易造成严重破坏并可能摧毁加拿大出口导向型经济的担忧。【原文：Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and his cabinet ministers tried to calm fears that US President-Elect Donald Trump will wreak havoc on trade and potentially devastate Canada’s export-driven economy.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜后，欧洲债券卖家将大举回归
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得美国大选前一周的暂停之后，欧洲最快可能在本周四恢复债务销售，公司债券发行将重新列入菜单。【原文：Debt sales could return to Europe as soon as Thursday, with corporate issuance back on the menu after a week-long pause in the lead-up to Donald Trump’s US election win.】

item.title: 顶级贷款人阿布拉收购巴西航空公司，戈尔计划破产退出
item.description: Gol Linhas Aereas Inteligentes SA 已达成一项全面的重组协议，其最大的贷款方 Abra Group Ltd. 将接管这家巴西廉价航空公司，并在明年使该公司摆脱破产保护。【原文：Gol Linhas Aereas Inteligentes SA has struck a sweeping restructuring deal that will see its top lender, Abra Group Ltd., take over the Brazilian budget airline and get the company out of Chapter 11 next year.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜引发赤字担忧后，市政债券暴跌
item.description: 在选民选举唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）为美国总统后，市政债券在周三的早盘交易中暴跌。此前，由于担心特朗普的政策会扩大已经臃肿的预算赤字并导致通胀飙升，美国国债遭到抛售。【原文：Municipal bonds plummeted in early trading on Wednesday after voters elected Donald Trump as US president. The move followed a rout in US Treasuries, which sold off over concerns that Trump’s policies will widen an already bloated budget deficit and cause inflation to surge.】

item.title: 特朗普回归有望再次颠覆美国外交政策
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）即将重返白宫，他发誓要颠覆与盟友和敌人的关系，而且几乎没有面临上次限制他推动 "美国优先 "的制约因素。【原文：Donald Trump is headed back to the White House, vowing to upend relations with allies and enemies alike and facing few of the constraints that limited his “America first” push last time.】

item.title: 亚马逊创纪录，强劲业绩加速全年涨势

item.title: 据说收购公司将收购利洁时 60 亿英镑的家庭护理资产
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Advent International 和 Apollo Global Management Inc.等收购公司正在研究收购利洁时集团（Reckitt Benckiser Group Plc）家庭护理资产的可能性。【原文：Advent International and Apollo Global Management Inc. are among buyout firms studying a potential acquisition of Reckitt Benckiser Group Plc’s homecare assets, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 莫桑比克主要港口在选举骚乱后停止接收货物
item.description: 莫桑比克的马普托港是重要的铬出口枢纽，由于这个东南非国家持续的选举动乱，该港口已经停止接收货物。【原文：Mozambique’s Maputo port, a key chrome export hub, has stopped receiving cargo due to ongoing election unrest in the southeast African nation.】

item.title: 津巴布韦将于本月就 210 亿美元债务问题举行会谈
item.description: 津巴布韦将于本月晚些时候恢复与债权人的谈判，以重组 210 亿美元的外债，从而摆脱自 1999 年以来一直被国际资本市场拒之门外的违约局面。【原文：Zimbabwe will resume talks with creditors later this month to restructure $21 billion in external debt as it seeks to exit a default that’s kept it locked out of international capital markets since 1999.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长金多斯警告特朗普关税计划的 "巨大 "影响
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）表示，如果美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）实施他在竞选期间威胁要征收的进口关税，全球经济的增长和通胀将面临潜在的不利冲击。【原文：The global economy faces potentially detrimental shocks to growth and inflation if US President-elect Donald Trump implements the kind of import tariffs he threatened during his campaign, according to European Central Bank Vice President Luis de Guindos.】

item.title: 期货市场显示比特币破纪录反弹势头强劲
item.description: 期货市场暗示，唐纳德-特朗普在美国总统大选中获胜引发的比特币破纪录涨势可能才刚刚开始。【原文：The futures market is suggesting that the record-breaking rally in Bitcoin triggered by Donald Trump’s victory in the US presidential election may just be getting started.】

item.title: 华尔街的反应：特朗普获胜，风险全开
item.description: 周三早些时候，随着唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在与副总统卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）的竞争中取得决定性胜利，成功连任白宫总统，风险狂潮笼罩着金融资产。【原文：A risk-on frenzy enveloped financial assets early Wednesday as Donald Trump clinched the White House for a second term, decisively winning what had been seen as a neck-and-neck race against Vice President Kamala Harris.】

item.title: 阿斯利康称现任和前任高管卷入中国调查
item.description: 阿斯利康公司（AstraZeneca Plc）的两名现任和两名前任高管正在中国接受调查，调查涉嫌违反药品进口和数据隐私方面的法律。【原文：Two current and two former senior executives at AstraZeneca Plc are under investigation in China in an ongoing probe into alleged breaches of laws around drug importations and data privacy, the company said.】

item.title: 波多黎各执政党抵御 "坏兔子"，保持领先地位
item.description: 波多黎各的詹尼弗-冈萨雷斯-科隆（Jenniffer Gonzalez-Colon）是唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的支持者和终身共和党人，她在总督竞选中遥遥领先，挫败了超级巨星坏兔子（Bad Bunny）试图左右选票对她不利的企图。【原文：Puerto Rico’s Jenniffer Gonzalez-Colon, a Donald Trump supporter and lifelong Republican, is leading the race for governor, bucking an attempt by superstar Bad Bunny to sway the vote against her.】
